Sorry for the question mark

you can use tab completion on the terminal to finish typing the filename for something. Just start typing the file, press tab and then the rest of it should show up.  Then you can do something like: mv youroldfilename yournewfilename

dpkg --force-all -r yourpackage.  This may not work though and I really don't like suggesting it as it could break your system.
